subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Idea,
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Oh for crying out loud! No one has to read every frikkin' post! If ya don't
like the voices/messages/e-mails don't open the damn things!  I'm no
exc\pert, but I'm pretty sure all e-mail programs have a freaking delete
button.

 Not one of us "knows better", so try not to judge what someone else is
getting.

 Frank-S

On Thu, Jul 8, 2010 at 3:18 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
> *I have an idea, those that do not want any files from me, please say so,
> those on the list that do, just mail me privately, and I will share my stuff
> only with you, when I get a file that is something from Angels or whomever,
> I will just email it to you privately to see what you think.  Other wise I
> will not post my files to the lists any longer, sorry but I am not going to
> change my personality, I did not squawk at any of one else's files, all
> those other people that send in files.  Some to me might be offensive, and I
> may not care for, yet I don't say a thing, because I believe in freedom of
> speech...if you don't like what I send, just pass me up, don't even try to
> listen to them, chances are maybe you cannot hear them anyway.   I do not
> control what Spirit's say to me, how did you ever get that idea?  sf*
>
> 
>

Oh o c ying ou loud! No one has o ead e e y ikkin' pos ! I ya don' like he oices/messages/e-mails don' open he damn hings!  I'm no exc pe , bu I'm p e y su e all e-mail p og ams ha e a eaking dele e bu on. 

 
 No one o us "knows be e ", so y no o judge wha someone else is ge ing. 
 
 F ank-S
